p: Among the alternatives to synthetic fungicides, essential oils have gained interest for such plant disease management [ 32]. Indeed, lemongrass essential oil ( Cymbopogon citratus) was shown to provide 100% inhibition of mycelial growth of S. cucurbitacearum [ 22, 33]. Moreover, Dalcin et al. [ 34] reported that treatment with a low concentration of lemongrass essential oil (<0.3%) reduced the severity of S. cucurbitacearum infections in melon plants.
